'''Radiant Spincrystal 110''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[The Rotating Realm]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of an [[Energy Transfer Device]] near some crates in the [[Administrative Area]] of the [[Fortress of Meropide]].
